queries.description: Group by with select and aggregate column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with select and multiple aggregations one 1 column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3), AVG(a.col3), MAX(a.col3), MIN(a.col3) FROM a GROUP BY a.col1
output: LogicalProject(col1=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], EXPR$2=[/(CAST($1):DOUBLE NOT NULL, $2)], EXPR$3=[$3], EXPR$4=[$4])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], agg#1=[COUNT($2)], agg#2=[MAX($3)], agg#3=[MIN($4)], aggType=[FINAL])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($2)], agg#1=[COUNT()], agg#2=[MAX($2)], agg#3=[MIN($2)], aggType=[LEAF])

queries.description: Group by with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: Group by count(*) with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, COUNT(*) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1
queries.notes: TODO: Needs follow up. Project should only keep a.col1 since the other columns are pushed to the filter, but it currently keeps them all

queries.description: Group by on 2 columns with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col2, a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col1 = 'a'  GROUP BY a.col1, a.col2

queries.description: Group by with having clause
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1, COUNT(*), SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 AND MAX(a.col3) >= 0 AND MIN(a.col3) < 20 AND SUM(a.col3) <= 10 AND AVG(a.col3) = 5
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT($1)], agg#1=[$SUM0($2)], agg#2=[MAX($3)], agg#3=[MIN($4)], aggType=[FINAL])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[$SUM0($2)], agg#2=[MAX($2)], agg#3=[MIN($2)], aggType=[LEAF])

queries.description: Group by with having clause and select alias
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT a.col1 as value1, COUNT(*) AS count, SUM(a.col3) as SUM FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 AND MAX(a.col3) >= 0 AND MIN(a.col3) < 20 AND SUM(a.col3) <= 10 AND AVG(a.col3) = 5
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT($1)], agg#1=[$SUM0($2)], agg#2=[MAX($3)], agg#3=[MIN($4)], aggType=[FINAL])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[$SUM0($2)], agg#2=[MAX($2)], agg#3=[MIN($2)], aggType=[LEAF])

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with select and aggregate column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with select and AVG aggregation
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, AVG(a.col3) FROM a GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with select and multiple aggregations one 1 column
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, SUM(a.col3), AVG(a.col3), MAX(a.col3), MIN(a.col3) FROM a GROUP BY a.col1
output: LogicalProject(col1=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], EXPR$2=[/(CAST($1):DOUBLE NOT NULL, $2)], EXPR$3=[$3], EXPR$4=[$4])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], agg#1=[COUNT()], agg#2=[MAX($1)], agg#3=[MIN($1)], aggType=[DIRECT])

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, SUM(a.col3), MAX(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization count(*) with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, COUNT(*) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1
queries.notes: TODO: Needs follow up. Project should only keep a.col1 since the other columns are pushed to the filter, but it currently keeps them all

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization on 2 columns with filter
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col2, a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col1 = 'a'  GROUP BY a.col1, a.col2

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with having clause
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, COUNT(*), SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 AND MAX(a.col3) >= 0 AND MIN(a.col3) < 20 AND SUM(a.col3) <= 10 AND AVG(a.col3) = 5
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[$SUM0($1)], agg#2=[MAX($1)], agg#3=[MIN($1)], aggType=[DIRECT])

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with having clause but no count
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1, SUM(a.col3) FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1 HAVING MAX(a.col3) >= 0 AND MIN(a.col3) < 20 AND SUM(a.col3) <= 10 AND AVG(a.col3) = 5
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[$SUM0($1)], agg#1=[MAX($1)], agg#2=[MIN($1)], agg#3=[COUNT()], aggType=[DIRECT])

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with having clause and select alias
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_skip_leaf_stage_group_by='true') */ a.col1 as value1, COUNT(*) AS count, SUM(a.col3) as SUM FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 AND a.col2 = 'a' GROUP BY a.col1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 AND MAX(a.col3) >= 0 AND MIN(a.col3) < 20 AND SUM(a.col3) <= 10 AND AVG(a.col3) = 5
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], agg#1=[$SUM0($1)], agg#2=[MAX($1)], agg#3=[MIN($1)], aggType=[DIRECT])

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with partitioned aggregated values
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_leaf_return_final_result='true') */ col1, COUNT(DISTINCT col2) AS cnt FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 GROUP BY col1 ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with partitioned aggregated values and group trim enabled
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_leaf_return_final_result='true', is_enable_group_trim='true') */ col1, COUNT(DISTINCT col2) AS cnt FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 GROUP BY col1 ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[DISTINCTCOUNT($1)], aggType=[FINAL], leafReturnFinalResult=[true], collations=[[1 DESC]], limit=[10])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[DISTINCTCOUNT($1)], aggType=[LEAF], leafReturnFinalResult=[true], collations=[[1 DESC]], limit=[10])

queries.description: SQL hint based group by optimization with group trim enabled without returning group key
queries.sql: EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT /*+ aggOptions(is_enable_group_trim='true') */ COUNT(DISTINCT col2) AS cnt FROM a WHERE a.col3 >= 0 GROUP BY col1 ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10
output: PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[DISTINCTCOUNT($1)], aggType=[FINAL], collations=[[1 DESC]], limit=[10])
PinotLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], agg#0=[DISTINCTCOUNT($1)], aggType=[LEAF], collations=[[1 DESC]], limit=[10])
